issue.title: Interface Content should extend Comparable<Content>, JsonReadable, JsonPatchable and implement a Smart decorator.

repository.name: jcabi-github
repository.description: Java Object-Oriented Wrapper of GitHub API, with a fake implementation of the entire GitHub API (for your tests)

issue.body:
I'm working on ticket #217, and I saw that `Content` interface wasn't implemented. 

Because there is no puzzle and issue to keep track it, so i would like to create new issue

Interface `Content` should extend `Comparable<Content>`, `JsonReadable`, `JsonPatchable` and implement a `Smart` decorator.

`Smart` decorator class should be able to return the various attributes of the JSON response

Please refer to API: http://developer.github.com/v3/repos/contents/#get-contents

body: @yegor256 I think the new method `codes()` should return `Iterable<Content>`, but `Content` has no implementation yet. so i would like to create new issue here #247.

issue.title: Github incorrect /NotNull message

repository.name: jcabi-github
repository.description: Java Object-Oriented Wrapper of GitHub API, with a fake implementation of the entire GitHub API (for your tests)

issue.body:
Found this issue when working on #217 

In Github.java

```
@NotNull(message = "rate limit API is never NULL")
Search search();
```

Should be "Search API is never NULL"
